pullrequest.title: Fix for adding links after a model has been constructed

content.raw:
I’ve opened a PR to fix this on the dartsim end: [https://github.com/dartsim/dart/pull/1112](https://github.com/dartsim/dart/pull/1112)

But I’m also approving this PR so that it doesn’t get blocked in the event that the dartsim PR takes longer than expected to merge.
content.html:
I’ve opened a PR to fix this on the dartsim end: https://github.com/dartsim/dart/pull/1112

But I’m also approving this PR so that it doesn’t get blocked in the event that the dartsim PR takes longer than expected to merge.
